Subject: At the Alliance Base

X-Mailer: AOL 4.0 for Windows 95 sub 107

::Reptilica::

The Alliance base's defences activate as Starscream flies in, Reptilica 
jumping out of him as the autoguns open fire.

"STAND DOWN!!!" Reptilica yells into his comm, running as fast as he could 
away from Starscream. The autoguns stop firing, having fired several dozen 
shots at the Predacon.

"ARE YOU INSANE?!" Reptilica yells, rounding on Starscream, "This is a fully 
armed base! How stupid are you Predacons anyways?!"
